libkovan
Class Sensor

java.lang.Object
  libkovan.Sensor
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnalogSensor, DigitalSensor
public abstract class Sensor
extends java.lang.Object

The Sensor class is a static class. It provides all basic functions for a sensor instance. In addition it offers a static function for reading the button values.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Markus Klein

Sensor

Method Detail

getButtonPressed

public static int getButtonPressed(int btn)
This method is used to request if one of the buttons on the KIPR Link is pressed. For example, Sesnor.getButtonPressed(A_BUTTON) returns if the A button is pressed.

Parameters:
btn - button constant
Returns:
button value (1 for pressed and 0 for not)

getPort

public int getPort()
Returns the port of the sensor instance.

Returns:
port

setPort

public void setPort(int sensorPort)
Sets the port of the sensor instance.

Parameters:
sensorPort - sensor port

getValue

public abstract int getValue()
Returns the current value of the sensor.

Returns:
sensor value
